ibmSystemRaidControllerTable.name: ibmSystemRaidControllerTable
ibmSystemRaidControllerTable.description: The IBMPSG_RAIDController class represents a RAID Controller

ibmSystemRaidControllerEntry.name: ibmSystemRaidControllerEntry
ibmSystemRaidControllerEntry.description: This class defines an entry for each IBMPSG_RAIDController instance. Each instance of the IBMPSG_RAIDController class contains status and descriptive information for each disk recognized by the Director SMART provider.

ibmSystemRaidControllerKeyIndex.name: ibmSystemRaidControllerKeyIndex
ibmSystemRaidControllerKeyIndex.description: The RAID controller table index number (controller1, controller2, etc.)

ibmSystemRaidControllerControllerID.name: ibmSystemRaidControllerControllerID
ibmSystemRaidControllerControllerID.description: The DeviceID that identifies the disk

ibmSystemRaidControllerBIOSVersion.name: ibmSystemRaidControllerBIOSVersion
ibmSystemRaidControllerBIOSVersion.description: The version of the controllers BIOS

ibmSystemRaidControllerFirmwareVersion.name: ibmSystemRaidControllerFirmwareVersion
ibmSystemRaidControllerFirmwareVersion.description: The version of the controllers firmwar

ibmSystemRaidControllerDriverVersion.name: ibmSystemRaidControllerDriverVersion
ibmSystemRaidControllerDriverVersion.description: The version of the controllers device driver

ibmSystemRaidControllerSlot.name: ibmSystemRaidControllerSlot
ibmSystemRaidControllerSlot.description: The slot number the controller resides in

ibmSystemRaidControllerFRU.name: ibmSystemRaidControllerFRU
ibmSystemRaidControllerFRU.description: The FRU number of the controller

ibmSystemRaidControllerInitiatorIDs.name: ibmSystemRaidControllerInitiatorIDs
ibmSystemRaidControllerInitiatorIDs.description: Specifies the controllers initiator IDs using a comma as the delimiter

ibmSystemRaidControllerStatus.name: ibmSystemRaidControllerStatus
ibmSystemRaidControllerStatus.description: The current status of the controller

ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveTable.name: ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveTable
ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveTable.description: The IBMPSG_RAIDDiskDrive class represents a RAID physical disk

ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveEntry.name: ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveEntry
ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveEntry.description: This class defines an entry for each IBMPSG_RAIDDiskDrive instance. Each instance of the IBMPSG_RAIDDiskDrive class contains status and descriptive information for each disk attached to the RAID controller.

ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveKeyIndex.name: ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveKeyIndex
ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveKeyIndex.description: The Physical Disk Drive table index number (Disk Drive 0, Disk Drive 1, etc.)

ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveDeviceID.name: ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveDeviceID
ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveDeviceID.description: The device ID of the drive

ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveDiskDriveID.name: ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveDiskDriveID
ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveDiskDriveID.description: The target ID of the disk drive

ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveControllerID.name: ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveControllerID
ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveControllerID.description: The ID of the controller it is attached to

ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveChannelID.name: ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveChannelID
ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveChannelID.description: The channel on the controller the drive is attached to

ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveFirmware.name: ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveFirmware
ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveFirmware.description: The firmware revision of the drive

ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveState.name: ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveState
ibmSystemRaidDiskDriveState.description: The current state of the physical drive. 0=Empty, 1=Standby, 4=Defunct Hot Spare, 5=Standby Hot Spare, 8=Defunct Disk Drive, 129=Ready, 133=Hot Spare, 137=Online, 139=Rebuild, 254=Reserved

ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveTable.name: ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveTable
ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveTable.description: The IBMPSG_RAIDLogicalDrive class represents a RAID Logical disk (Logical Drive 0, Logical Drive 1, etc.)

ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveEntry.name: ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveEntry
ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveEntry.description: This class defines an entry for each IBMPSG_RAIDLogicalDrive instance. Each instance of the IBMPSG_RAIDLogicalDrive class contains status and descriptive information for each RAID Logical disk.

ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveKeyIndex.name: ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveKeyIndex
ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveKeyIndex.description: The Logical Disk Drive table index number (Logical Drive 0, Logical Drive 1, etc.)

ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveLogicalDriveID.name: ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveLogicalDriveID
ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveLogicalDriveID.description: The ID of the logical drive

ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveControllerID.name: ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveControllerID
ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveControllerID.description: The ID of the controller the logical drive belongs to

ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveArrayID.name: ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveArrayID
ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveArrayID.description: The ID of the array that the logical drive belongs to

ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveRAIDLevel.name: ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveRAIDLevel
ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveRAIDLevel.description: The RAID level of the logical drive (RAID 1, RAID 5, etc.)

ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveDataSpace.name: ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveDataSpace
ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveDataSpace.description: Size of the logical drive in megabytes

ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveParitySpace.name: ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveParitySpace
ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveParitySpace.description: Parity space of the logical drive in megabytes

ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveIsBlocked.name: ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveIsBlocked
ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveIsBlocked.description: The logical drive is in a blocked state

ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveState.name: ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveState
ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveState.description: The current state of the logical drive. 0=Free, 2=Offline, 3=Okay, 4=Critical, 5=Logical Drive Migration, 6=System, 20=Critical Logical Drive Migration, 36=Critical System

ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveStatus.name: ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveStatus
ibmSystemRaidLogicalDriveStatus.description: The status of the logical drive

ibmSystemRaidNoControllers.description: Informational: No controllers were found in this system.
